price: Woi yε nkonyaa anaa naadaasεm, anaasε monhunu?”
arabic: أَفَسِحۡرٌ هَٰذَآ أَمۡ أَنتُمۡ لَا تُبۡصِرُونَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: afasiḥ'run hādhā am antum lā tub'ṣirūna
